prompt: Medium shot, slightly low angle to capture energy. A stylish HR Director in her 40s sits relaxed on a concrete bench in a sunny modern urban plaza. She is wearing a sharp electric blue blazer (#2563eb) and looking at a tablet, throwing her head back in a genuine, unposed laugh of pure relief and triumph. On the bench next to her is a burnt orange notebook and coffee cup for color pop. In the soft-focus background, a 'traditional' photography crew struggles to carry heavy light stands, massive Pelican cases, and cables up a flight of stairs, looking sweaty and exhausted. The visual story contrasts the effortless savings of AI with the heavy burden of traditional shoots. Emerald green landscaping (#1e40af) surrounds the area. Vibrant Kodak Ektar 100 colors with punchy saturation, shot on Hasselblad X2D 100C, 85mm lens, f/2.8, natural skin texture, golden hour warmth, editorial photography for Vogue Business
